articles.description: Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak wants to join Premier League champions Liverpool before the transfer window closes.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United striker determined to join Liverpool

articles.description: All the latest transfer news as Jack Grealish closes in on a loan move from Manchester City to Everton plus the latest gossip.
articles.title: Transfer news: Spurs exploring deal for Eze plus Grealish latest

articles.description: Tottenham are exploring a deal for Crystal Palace and England forward Eberechi Eze.
articles.title: Eberechi Eze transfer: Tottenham exploring a deal for Crystal Palace forward

articles.description: Bournemouth's Illia Zabarnyi joins Paris St-Germain in a £57m deal as the Cherries' sales of defenders this summer reaches £147m.
articles.title: Illia Zabarnyi: Bournemouth defender completes £57m move to PSG

articles.description: Robert Lewandowski discusses the time he "said yes" to a Man Utd move, the influence of Jurgen Klopp and why the sky is the limit for Lamine Yamal.
articles.title: Manchester United: Robert Lewandowski 'said yes' to Red Devils move in 2012

articles.description: Former Premier League referee David Coote given eight-week ban by the FA for his comments about ex-Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: David Coote: Former Premier League ref given two-month ban by FA

articles.description: Italian athlete Mattia Debertolis dies after collapsing during orienteering event in China.
articles.title: Mattia Debertolis: Italian athlete dies after collapse at World Games

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Ferrari, Bortoleto, lap records, single-time world champions and any prospect of German Grand Prix returning?

articles.description: Japanese boxing officials vote to implement stricter rules on weight loss and will also introduce urine tests following the deaths of two fighters in Tokyo.
articles.title: Japanese boxing deaths: Officials vote for stricter rules on weight loss

articles.description: Two Norwegian ski jumpers and three team officials are charged following allegations of tampering with ski suits, the sport's governing body announces.
articles.title: Norwegian ski jumpers charged for using 'cheating' jumpsuits
